content: skill level advanced beginner **materials** 2 colors of any weight yarn and a crochet hook to match that yarn i recommend aran weight yarn and a 5mm hook i used garnstudio drops nepal 50g = 75m / 1 8oz = 82yds yarn needle scissors **gauge yardage & measurements** gauge yardage and your project s measurements depend entirely on the yarn you choose to use with aran weight yarn and 5mm crochet hook gauge 10cmx10cm / 4 x4 = ~16 stitches x 12 row of pattern measurements 220cm/87 7 height x 11cm/4 3 width pattern repeated twice i had three 50g skeins of each color and used a bit more than two skeins of each **this pattern is for personal use only **
